pages.text: The third tab in the Maid GUI is Maid Bauble Inventory. The mod provides several maid baubles that can protect your maids: $(li)Ultramarine Orb Elixir: similar to the Totem of Undying, it will prevent the maid from dying up to 6 times. $(li)Bauble of Tomb: When the maid dies, generates a tomb that contains all items dropped by the maid.
$(li)Bauble of Protection: Makes the maid immune to all damage.
